duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead a team of Pet Care Center managers, leaders, and partners, driving business through talent acquisition, training, and development.
Meet or exceed goals related to Pet Care Center sales, profitability, and operational excellence.
Ensure the proper health, appearance, welfare, and proper handling of all animals in the center.
Oversee marketing the Pet Care Center and its products, including planning on-site and community events, such as adoptions and school visits.
Ensure the Pet Care Center's appearance adheres to operational standards, safety procedures, and professional image.
Model inspiring leadership and selling behaviors to Pet Care Center partners and associates.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma or equivalent (GED) with proficiency in basic business & finance acumen, analysis, and problem-solving skills.
Three or more years of management experience, with previous retail management experience preferred.
Working knowledge of general business practices and strong organizational skills.
Aptitude for demonstrating strong customer service and the ability to instruct others, along with a keen and genuine interest in all kinds of animals.
